title: 10 Years After the Collapse of Lehman Brothers
description:
It's been 10 years since the collapse of Wall Street's Lehman Brothers, the turning point for a financial crisis that sent shock waves around the world. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg News Executive Editor Joe Weisenthal on what happened then, and what potential bubbles we should be watching now. 
FOLLOW UP
You can follow Joe at@TheStalwart
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
itunes:author: Bloomberg
itunes:subtitle: with Joe Weisenthal (Bloomberg News)
